text: Tamagra Juda kini vahe'motane Jerusalemi kumapima nemaniza vahe'motanena Ra Anumzamo'ma hiankea antahiho, Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzana, Israeli vahe'mokizmi Anumzamo'a amanage hie, antahiho Nagra rama'a knaza avre'na ama agupofina esuge'za ana zamofo agenkema vahe'mo'za nentahisu'za antri hugahaze.
